complianceqa.answer: Your CRD number was included in the email notifying you of your FINRA Reg Element CE requirement.  You can also find your CRD number on BrokerCheck [link]
FINRA will send an email confirmation when your CE is complete.  You do not need to forward this to the home office, but please retain it for your own records.

You can review and update your disclosed outside business activities on the Compliance Portal. To disclose a new activity, click 'Submit New' and answers the questions in the Wizard Form. To make changes to an existing activity, click'Update' next to the activity that needs to be updated.
You can print your completion certificate from the Learning Network [link]
The Personal Disclosure Statement was discontinued as of January 1, 2017.
There is a Switch decision grid available on LINKnet. [link]s
Your registration will be reactivated the day after you completed your FINRA CE course.
